pages.text: "A machine capable of producing large quantities of heat energy by burning combustible items."$(p)The fuelwood heater will consume combustibles to produce heat energy. Combustibles include, but not limited to, coal/charcoal, lava, wooden objects.
How much fuel each combustible give is their burning time x 10. For example, lava buckets have a burning time of 1,000, thus they will give 10,000 Fuel.
